title: Hand writing ID
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710060737im_/http:/typophile.com/files/A_CAL_5844.jpg)

Trying all morning to find this somewhat gestural script ...grr.

Thanks in advance!
author: 5star

comments.content: 3 different /e... Most probably hand-drawn... Have a look to [Magpie Paper Works](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710060737/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Magpie_Paper_Works) and [Emily Lime](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710060737/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Emily_Lime) for alternatives.
